name: Blockuku
description:
Blockuku is a brand new type of puzzler, set in a minimalist relaxing environment. It's like Sudoku with blocks.

The game requires you to think in a ​different way with a mix of spatial and logic skills.

Blockuku is great for creativity, each puzzle requires you to learn new skills and think in new ways.

There are no high scores or timers, this game is intended to be enjoyed as a relaxing experience.
